epigraph.quote: The repo was reset on Friday evening.
epigraph.response: By Monday morning, it was transformed.

acts.title: The Reset
acts.summary: Clean init: 1.79M lines imported. Memory systems implemented with wake-sleep cycles. Actor-critic architecture added. 11 commits establishing foundation.

acts.title: The Pruning
acts.summary: PyTorch training code removed. JAX TPU implementation added. 17 empty stubs deleted. 68 commits migrating frameworks and pruning dead code.

acts.title: The Building
acts.summary: Shopping module with WebXR moodboards. Earcon audio across platforms. 42 Composio integrations. 55 commits adding production features.

acts.title: The Training
acts.summary: 18 data loaders × 11 phases = 100% coverage. PCGrad gradient surgery. 112/112 gradient layers healthy. 15 commits completing ML pipeline.

acts.title: The Identity
acts.summary: CLAUDE.md rewritten to essence. Seven colony rule files. Project identity finalized. 16 commits defining who Kagami is.
